buffs.description: Increases the undead tribe friendliness that is gained from undead unit seals by 5% for each 5-star Crow Knight, and 10% for each 6-star Crow Knight. It is applied even when Crow Knight is in Time Shop and does not exceed 100%.
buffs.name: Undead Token

buffs.description: Increases darkness resistance by 100. ( It is applied even when Crow Knight is in Time Shop. Darkness resistance by Crow Knight does not exceed 2,000. )
buffs.name: Darkness Resistance
